Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that no such law has been enacted in Pakistan in January 2021, as confirmed by the National Assembly of Pakistan.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the situation by stating that two marriages for men have become mandatory, which is not true.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence or official sources provided to validate the existence of the law.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the law mentioned in the video is true without providing any substantial evidence.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the claim is likely satirical, as similar claims have circulated in satirical posts in previous years.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement bias in this claim.
Falters at times: There is no evidence of the claim faltering at times bias in this claim.
